name: Kyppec,inc
specialty: Skilled Nursing Facility, Nursing Care, Pediatric

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Kyppec,inc is a Skilled Nursing Facility, Nursing Care, Pediatric provider based in Louisville, KY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $109.2M in Medicaid payments across 524K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $109.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,644 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
